entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
